languages.text: "Арбитес никогда не сомневаются, вынося приговор, ибо руку того, кто следует своему долгу, ведет сам Император. Вольный Торговец выносил{mf||а} приговор, как {mf|ему|ей} и долженствовало. А значит, {mf|его|ее} решения благословлены Богом-Императором ..."

traits.locale_text: "Арбитес никогда не сомневаются, вынося приговор, ибо руку того, кто следует своему долгу, ведет сам Император. Вольный Торговец выносил приговор, как ему и долженствовало. А значит, его решения благословлены Богом-Императором ..."
traits.speaker: VC2_ArbitresMarshal

languages.text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."
languages.original_text: "Арбитес никогда не сомневаются, вынося приговор, ибо руку того, кто следует своему долгу, ведет сам Император. Вольный Торговец выносил{mf||а} приговор, как {mf|ему|ей} и долженствовало. А значит, {mf|его|ее} решения благословлены Богом-Императором ..."

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was his charge. Therefore, his decision is blessed by the God-Emperor…"

"The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."
"The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgment, for our hand is guided by the God-Emperor. To condemn the one who passes judgment is to question the God-Emperor Himself..."
"The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for our hand is guided by the God-Emperor. To condemn the one who passes judgement is to question the God-Emperor Himself..."
"The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for our hand is guided by the God-Emperor. To condemn the one who passes judgement is to question the God-Emperor Himself..."

"The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was his charge. Therefore, his decision is blessed by the God-Emperor…"

"The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."

languages.text: "Das Adeptus Arbites zögert nie, ein Urteil zu sprechen, denn der Imperator führt die Hand, die ihre Pflicht erfüllt. "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat {mf|gemäß seiner Pflicht|gemäß ihrer Pflicht} ein Urteil gefällt! Also hat {mf|seine|ihre} Entscheidung den Segen des Gottimperators ..."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: "Das Adeptus Arbites zögert nie, ein Urteil zu sprechen, denn der Imperator führt die Hand, die ihre Pflicht erfüllt. "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat {mf|gemäß seiner Pflicht|gemäß ihrer Pflicht} ein Urteil gefällt! Also hat {mf|seine|ihre} Entscheidung den Segen des Gottimperators ..."

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Arbites n'hésite jamais à rendre la justice, car c'est l'Empereur qui guide sa main dévouée. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a rendu son jugement, comme l'exigeaient ses responsabilités. Sa décision est donc bénie par l'Empereur-Dieu... »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Arbites n'hésite jamais à rendre la justice, car c'est l'Empereur qui guide sa main dévouée. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a rendu son jugement, comme l'exigeaient ses responsabilités. Sa décision est donc bénie par l'Empereur-Dieu... »

languages.text: “法务部会毫不犹豫地向犯人传达判决，因为帝皇会指引帝国仆从忠实履行职务。行商浪人已经按照{mf|他|她}的考虑下达了判断，因此，{mf|他|她}的决定也得到了神皇的祝福……”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: “法务部会毫不犹豫地向犯人传达判决，因为帝皇会指引帝国仆从忠实履行职务。行商浪人已经按照{mf|他|她}的考虑下达了判断，因此，{mf|他|她}的决定也得到了神皇的祝福……”

languages.text: «El Adeptus Arbites nunca duda a la hora de dictar sentencia, pues el Dios Emperador guía la mano que cumple su deber. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha dictado sentencia como le correspondía. Por lo tanto, su bendición ha sido bendecida por el Dios Emperador...».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Arbites nunca duda a la hora de dictar sentencia, pues el Dios Emperador guía la mano que cumple su deber. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha dictado sentencia como le correspondía. Por lo tanto, su bendición ha sido bendecida por el Dios Emperador...».

languages.text: 「高等裁定局は裁きを下すことに一切の躊躇はありません。私たちの手は神帝陛下によって導かれているのです。裁きを下す者を非難することは、神帝陛下そのものを疑うことになります…」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for our hand is guided by the God-Emperor. To condemn the one who passes judgement is to question the God-Emperor Himself..."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局は裁きを下すことに一切の躊躇はありません。私たちの手は神帝陛下によって導かれているのです。裁きを下す者を非難することは、神帝陛下そのものを疑うことになります…」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites, hüküm vermekte tereddüt etmez. Zira İmparator, vazifesini yerine getiren eli yönlendirir. Hür Tacir, vazifesi gereği hükmünü vermiştir. Bu nedenle kararı, Tanrı İmparator tarafından kutsanmıştır..."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites never hesitate in passing judgement, for the Emperor guides the hand that fulfils its duty. The Rogue Trader has delivered judgement as was {mf|his|her} charge. Therefore, {mf|his|her} decision is blessed by the God-Emperor..."
